title: Extending the concessionary loan facilities under the 'Enterprise Sri Lanka' Programme
decision_details: - The proposal made by Hon. Mangala Samaraweera, the Minister of Finance and Mass Media, to extend the benefits of the concessionary loan schemes under the 'Enterprise Sri Lanka' Programme to enable those who are engaged in the technical field, the professionals who hold the certificate of National Vocational Qualification (NVQ) level 5,6 and 7, those who are engaged in small scale animal husbandry sector, those who manufacture packing material using bio degradable items and to those who seek investments to set up Day Care Centres, was approved by the Cabinet.
